|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [SmithyApiDefinition](./smithy-cdk.smithyapidefinition.md) | **_(BETA)_** Thin wrapper for a Smithy generated OpenAPI JSON spec file. Allows for injection of CDK references into certain sections of the file. |

## Abstract Classes

|  Abstract Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [SmithyIntegration](./smithy-cdk.smithyintegration.md) | **_(BETA)_** Base class for SmithyIntegrations, which bind a AWS resource to an API path from a Smithy spec. At least one of uri/credentialsRole must be defined |
